component.name: SD Card
component.purpose: It provide secondary storage for the LPG to save the weather data and configurations of the AWS gateway.
component.description: The SD card is inserted into the SD card module which is then fixed into the SD card module female headers on the LPG board. It stores the weather data reports recieved from the nodes of the station before the gateway can send them to the WIMEA-ICT server. It also store configuration settings for the AWS like the port to which the data is sent on the WIMEA-ICT server.
